title: I Want To Know Your Secret!
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>*Stare*~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Can I help you, Rina-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’m just observing you, Karin-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Did you get anything useful?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>No, I don’t think so. You see.... I saw an article that had pictures of you in it. And I feel like those pictures convey so many emotions. So I was wondering if there’s a secret technique to achieve that....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Are you complimenting me? I know what you mean, Rina-chan, but I don’t think there’s a secret to it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I guess so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I wish I could tell you.... Ah, that’s right, you have the Rina-chan’s board. Let’s add some more expressions to it. I’ll help.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Do you think I can make expressions like yours, Karin-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Hmm~, you’ll have to wait until you’re a bit older for that♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
